Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.model

Class TextSpan

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.model.TextSpan
All Implemented Interfaces:
Label
public final class TextSpan extends Object implements Label
A simple immutable label which only marks a location in text.
